text: Vassikasāṭikaṃ pana bhikkhunā kārayamānena pamāṇikā kāretabbā tatridaṃ pamāṇaṃ dīghaso cha vidatthiyo sugatavidatthiyā tiriyaṃ aḍḍhateyyā
edit: Vassikasāṭikaṃ pana bhikkhunā kārayamānena pamāṇikā kāretabbā tatridaṃ pamāṇaṃ dīghaso cha vidatthiyo sugatavidatthiyā tiriyaṃ aḍḍhateyyā

translations.transtext: 91. When a bhikkhu is having a rains-bathing cloth made, it is to be made to the standard measurement. Here the standard is this: six spans— using the sugata span — in length, two and a half spans in width.
๙๑. อนึ่ง ภิกษุผู้ให้ทําผ่าอาบน้ำฝนพึงทําให้ได้ประมาณนี้ประมาณในคํานั้นโดยยาว ๖ คืบ โดยกว้าง ๒ คืบครึ่งด้วยคืบสุคต

91. When a rains-cloth is being made by a bhikkhu it must be made according to the (prescribed) measurements. Here are the measurements: six spans in length of the sugata-span and two and a half across. For one exceeding that there is (a case entailing) expiation with cutting down.
